title: List of football stadiums in Saint Pierre and Miquelon
text: The following is a list of football stadiums in Saint Pierre and Miquelon, ordered by capacity. There are four outdoor <a href="Association%20football">football</a> pitches and one <a href="futsal">futsal</a> hall. There are currently plans to construct a new <a href="national%20stadium">national stadium</a> with <a href="artificial%20turf">artificial turf</a> as part of Saint Pierre and Miquelon's application to join <a href="CONCACAF">CONCACAF</a>.
